details.info: Developed a dynamic YouTube clone with real-time video content using the ''YouTube API'' and ''SHIMMER UI''.
Integrated Firebase for ''USER AUTHENTICATION'', enabling likes via ''CUSTOM HOOKS''. Optimized search with ''AUTOCOMPLETE'', ''DEBOUNCING'', ''CACHING'', and ''MEMOIZATION''.
Enhanced video interaction with ''NESTED COMMENTS'' and ''LIVE CHAT''.
React JS, React-Router-DOM, Redux Toolkit, CSS, and CSS3.

details.title: • Utilized Compound Components :
details.info: Designed a modular and extensible UI using ''COMPOUND COMPONENTS'', with ''SIGNIN'' and ''SIGNUP'' pages.

details.title: • Firebase Integration :
details.info: Integrated Firebase for ''USER AUTHENTICATION'' and ''DATABASE FUNCTIONALITIES, enabling secure user access and efficient data management.

details.title: • Fuse.js Live Search :
details.info: Implemented Fuse.js for ''REAL-TIME SEARCH'' functionality, enhancing user experience.

details.title: • Protected Routes :
details.info: Established ''PROTECTED ROUTES'' to restrict access to authenticated users.

details.title: • React Portal Integration :
details.info: Employed ''REACT PORTALS'' to render the Watch Page, providing responsive video playback experience.

details.title: • Technologies Used :
details.info: React JS, React-Router-DOM, Styled-Component, and Redux Toolkit.
Utilized Redux Toolkit for streamlined cart management: ''ADDING'', ''REMOVING'', and ''DELETING'' items.
Implemented efficient product search, individual product pages with Size and Color selection, and comprehensive filtering for ''SIZE'', ''COLOR'', ''GENDER'', and ''PRICE''.
React JS, React-Router-DOM, Redux Toolkit, CSS, and CSS3.
